tests.response: Most have been accepted and implemented, or will be implemented soon.

tests.suggestion: Introduction and tutorial for new users
tests.response: Accepted and implemented for mobile version. Will implement for web version soon.

tests.suggestion: Keep user logged in when re-opening app.

tests.response: This will be feasible after we implement email/phone verification. This is an add-on feature and will be done in a future implementation.
This will also be included in an add-on implementation of user privacy settings.

tests.suggestion: Automating admin jobs such as reviewing tag requests and sensitive post content.
tests.response: It's a good suggestion, and we will look into it in a future implementation. As of now, to ensure accuracy of admin operations, we will try our best to review the requests as soon as possible.

tests.suggestion: Attach multiple tags to a post.
tests.response: Rejected. In order to maintain high-quality communities, we encourage users to post specifically about one of their interests.

tests.suggestion: Allow users to claim more tags and delete tags without cooldown.
tests.response: After implementing the achievement system, users will be able to claim more tags as they level up. Nonetheless, we aim to support high-quality communities where users are truly passionate about their tags. Therefore, the number of tags each user can claim will still be constrained, and there will still be a cooldown for dropping tags.
